___$schema.description: The version of the schema specification, for example, `https://github.com/dotnet/docfx/v1.0/schema#

___version.description: The version of current schema object

___type.description: The type of the root document model MUST be `object`

___title.description: The title of current schema, `LandingPage`, for example. In DocFX, this value can be used to determine what kind of documents apply to this schema, If not specified, file name of this schema is used.

___id.description: It is best practice to include an `id` property as an unique identifier for each schema.
